page.title: 10ST. JOSEPH'S R.C. PARISH.
page.content: Our parish is{St. Joseph's}and the church is on{Gorton road.}At this church there are two priests, the parish priest and the curate.The prespytery is next to the church. Every year our parish holds a{summer {fair.}The fair is heid in the school grounds and is orgernised by the {priest}and the{volunteers}from the parish community. At the{summer fair}there are many stalls, clothes stalls, a pottery stall and many others. There are donkey rides and other activities like the tombola stall where you can win many prizes such as champaine, packets of sweets and many other items.
